author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two unidentified persons snatched 21 grams of gold from a boy in Pachcharisikara Street here on Tuesday.

The police said the boy, who was working for a jeweller in Thalayari Gurunathan Street, was walking with the gold in the narrow lane when some persons took it from him and escaped from the scene.

The city police are investigating.

In another incident reported under Koodal Nagar police limits on Monday night, a woman, Parameswari (46), lost six sovereigns of gold chain to motorbike-borne robbers at Vilangudi.
title: Gold snatched from boy
